title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.8 - Other sick leave credit
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 337.8 - Other sick leave credit

State Regulations

Upon appointment to a position in the unclassified
service, an employee shall be credited with any sick leave credits accrued
pursuant to the attendance rules for the classified service. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
337.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
